descriptions:
Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths, the perfect addition to your holiday decorations! This set includes 1 lighted Christmas wreath adorned with pine cones and red berries, 2 Christmas garlands with enchanting LED lights, 2 festive red Christmas bows, and 1 sturdy metal hanger. 

Crafted with high-quality PE synthetic fir, these wreaths and garlands exude elegance and durability. The warm yellow LED lights create a cozy and inviting ambiance, perfect for setting the mood during the festive season. Plus, with battery power, you can easily place them anywhere without worrying about messy cords.

The garlands are an impressive 106 inches long with a 10-inch diameter and feature 315 branch tips, ensuring a lush and full appearance. The Christmas wreath boasts a generous 17.72-inch diameter, making it a stunning centerpiece for your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, or shelves. 

The set also includes two large red bows, measuring 23.6 x 13.8 inches, adding a delightful touch of elegance to your holiday decor. 

Create a captivating and festive atmosphere with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths. Ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties, these decorations will transform any space into a winter wonderland. Place them on your front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantel, porch, cabinets, or shelves and let the holiday spirit come alive.
